post.author: QPsiren
post.body:
While I recognise that 1.4.1 is still a Beta patch, I went ahead and installed it.

It doesn't seem to like singleplayer much =( I'll get random crashes and freezes during the singleplayer game. Loading maps is particularly bad, but opening doors and starting cinematic sequences is also problematic. I'll get a maximum of 10minutes playtime before a crash happens.

v1.3 was fine, solid and stable. Nothing has changed on my computer between patches so I'm very confident it's not my software or hardware.

Is anyone else having this problem?

post.author: visciom
post.body: Yea I've been having crashes as well in singleplayer. The first 1.4 beta ran fine, but this new one crashes in the first 5 min of a singleplayer game.
